attributes.action: bring back our people taken hostage, illegally, by the Iranian government - by whatever means.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current situation with the illegal holding of British service personnel is unacceptable.

When will the government stand-up and show the British people, Iran and the world that we cannot be toyed with on the international stage.

These people put their life on the line to protect this nation, it is only reasonable that all measures should be considered for there swift return.

This petition is in support of covert or overt military action against Iran with the intention of safe extraction of our people.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence - 
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/rescue/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
